body: Favored by young rakes and others of means, this is a crystalline powder resembling salt. Mixed with water, it makes a fizzing cocktail that eliminates the effects of a hangover within 10 minutes of drinking it.
name: Alchemist's Kindness
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Special Substances and Items/Alchemists Kindness
